definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: increase, great number, greatness;—´[[מ]]: abs. Le 25:37; cstr. 1Sa 2:33 + 2t.; sf. [[מַרְבִּיתָם]] 1Ch 12:30 (van d.H. v:29);—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: increment, interest, usury, Le 25:37 (H; of food-stuffs, ‖[[נֶשֶׁךְ ]], of money; ´[[מ]]: of money Egypt. Aram., opp. [[ראש]] principal, Cooke:North-Sem. Inscr. 404).
great number: of people 2Ch 30:18; c. sf. = the greater part of them, 1Ch 12:30 (v. supr.).
